channel.title: Skype SMS
channel.description: I’ve been using the new 2.5 beta version of Skype for a week now and I am loving it.  The main new feature is the support for SMS messaging.  When I am out of the country I use SMS as...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Sean McGurk+00:00
item.description:
Hi Martin,
Can this (Skype SMS) be used to send SMS messages from another application? I'm looking for something that I can plug into an existing web project that will enable me to send SMS messages to a list of users (possibly for free, but realistically not...) There is a Web service here: http://www.webservicex.net/WS/WSDetails.aspx?CATID=4&WSID=60 that'll do it, but not to UK mobiles. Any ideas?
Cheers and I'll see you soon (at the next developer conference possibly).
Sean
item.dc:creator: Sean McGurk
